skills: Adobe Photoshop (Mock ups and Prototype), Axure RP (Wireframes and Interactive Prototypes), Adobe Illustrator (Vector Assets), Adobe Dreamweaver (Creation of mobile sites and Websites), HTML, CSS, Adobe Creative Suite CC, Jquery, Powerpoint, Keynote
summary: Customer Service and Retail Associate. Specializes in Design and technology, with a particular talent for building a solid customer base. Team-oriented, working well in a collaborative environment, yet thrives on personal sales achievements.
work_experience: This individual has a diverse background spanning from October 2011 to the present. As a Presentation Designer (February 2016 - Current), they specialize in designing and animating Keynote and Powerpoint slides, creating graphic assets, and working with producers to deliver presentations. In their role as a Multimedia Designer (October 2015 - Current), they create marketing and product tutorial videos, including storyboards, audio/video production, and editing, alongside catalog/brochure design, marketing collateral, online banners, and print advertising. They also develop marketing materials using cross-platform and industry-standard software, and address design-related marketing requests. Previously, as a User Experience and User Interaction Designer (Team Lead) from June 2013 to July 2015, they developed and implemented UX solutions, understood business objectives, conducted website evaluation and benchmarking, gathered user information, defined user scenarios, organized content, prototyped, and tested for usability. They were also responsible for project deliverables and quality assurance. Earlier, as a Customer Care and Digital Media professional at MTN Nigeria (October 2011 - June 2013), they ensured product adherence to quality standards, supported end-to-end product development, created requirements specifications, and conducted research on new products and services.
